title: Log spammed by :init-scope-error Error: filter not found
body:
[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*:  Bug

### Description

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)

Leave app in idle state (5-10 minutes). Come back, check the log:

```
01-19 20:35:28.770  9298  9394 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:29] - Handling re-frame event:  :handle-whisper-message
01-19 20:35:28.776  9298  9394 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.protocol.listeners:17] - :init-scope-error Error: filter not found

01-19 20:35:29.248  9298  9394 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.protocol.listeners:27] - :parse-payload
```

Log is getting spammed by these messages. App is working fine though.


### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status
- Have 1-1 and group chats with many messages and participants (4+)
- Go idle (just leave phone with app open and go away for 5-10 minutes)
- Return and check the logs

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: 

http://artifacts.status.im:8081/artifactory/nightlies-local/im.status.ethereum-0b035c.apk

[comment]: # (Android or iOS.)
* Operating System: Android 8.1, LG Nexus 5x
Tried 2 times - it happens every time for me after long idle time.

I ran into the same issue. Didn't happen right after 5 minutes wait, but consistently did after 10 minutes. It looks like this might be due to the app getting suspended and not resumed correctly (maybe some logic missing in that situation), but can't tell for sure.
